name: FS-37 Ravager
description: Contains many small pockets, allowing the user to evenly distribute the weight of ammunition, samples, and cool rocks.

name: FS-37 Ravager
description: Contains many small pockets, allowing the user to evenly distribute the weight of ammunition, samples, and cool rocks.

name: FS-55 Devastator
description: Contains many small pockets, allowing the user to evenly distribute the weight of ammunition, samples, and cool rocks.

name: FS-55 Devastator
description: Domestic versions of this armor enable colonial farmers to plant crops and mines side by side, safely.

name: SA-25 Steel Trooper
description: For optimal performance, the manufacturer recommends avoiding immersing this armor in salt water for prolonged periods.

name: SA-25 Steel Trooper
description: For optimal performance, the manufacturer recommends avoiding immersing this armor in salt water for prolonged periods.

name: SA-12 Servo-Assisted
description: Each servo-assisted limb contains 138 miniature motors, to support a natural gait and long-term spinal health.

name: SA-12 Servo-Assisted
description: Each servo-assisted limb contains 138 miniature motors, to support a natural gait and long-term spinal health.

name: SA-32 Dynamo
description: In mountainous colonies, domestic variants of this armor are used to throw weather monitoring equipment uphill.

name: SA-32 Dynamo
description: In mountainous colonies, domestic variants of this armor are used to throw weather monitoring equipment uphill.

name: CE-74 Breaker
description: A domestic version of this armor is available for citizens who wish to perform efficient home renovation projects.

name: CE-74 Breaker
description: A domestic version of this armor is available for citizens who wish to perform efficient home renovation projects.

name: CE-35 Trench Engineer
description: After colonists of Hellmire recovered a lost shipment of this armor, the local pastime of fence-smashing was born.

name: CE-35 Trench Engineer
description: After colonists of Hellmire recovered a lost shipment of this armor, the local pastime of fence-smashing was born.

name: CE-67 Titan
description: A quality product, this armor can destroy over 300,000 kilometers of fencing with no decline in operational efficiency.

name: CE-67 Titan
description: A quality product, this armor can destroy over 300,000 kilometers of fencing with no decline in operational efficiency.

name: CE-27 Ground Breaker
description: "The ground is just another obstacle that hasn't yet been cleared." - SGM Janet Jones, Excavation Corps Founder.

name: CE-27 Ground Breaker
description: "The ground is just another obstacle that hasn't yet been cleared." - SGM Janet Jones, Excavation Corps Founder.

name: CM-09 Bonesnapper
description: Based on a colonial surgeon's gown, where surgeries were often interrupted by a need to perform defensive duties.

name: CM-09 Bonesnapper
description: Based on a colonial surgeon's gown, where surgeries were often interrupted by a need to perform defensive duties.

name: CM-21 Trench Paramedic
description: The suit was once designed to hold a variety of battlefield medical equipment. Now it holds a generous supply of stims.

name: CM-21 Trench Paramedic
description: The suit was once designed to hold a variety of battlefield medical equipment. Now it holds a generous supply of stims.

name: CM-17 Butcher
description: An armor often worn by frontline surgeons, who are skilled at both putting bodies back together and taking them apart.

name: CM-17 Butcher
description: An armor often worn by frontline surgeons, who are skilled at both putting bodies back together and taking them apart.

name: CM-10 Clinician
description: Featuring patented reverse-seam technology, to reduce the likelihood of bodily fluids entering the armor's interior.

name: CM-10 Clinician
description: Featuring patented reverse-seam technology, to reduce the likelihood of bodily fluids entering the armor's interior.

name: FS-61 Dreadnought
description: With genuine gold accents, 74% of colonists voted this armor the set they would most like to be buried in.

name: FS-61 Dreadnought
description: With genuine gold accents, 74% of colonists voted this armor the set they would most like to be buried in.

name: CE-07 Demolition Specialist
description: Originally worn by lunar terraformers, this suit can withstand rapid changes in pressure, heat, and personal velocity.

name: CE-07 Demolition Specialist
description: Originally worn by lunar terraformers, this suit can withstand rapid changes in pressure, heat, and personal velocity.

name: SC-15 Drone Master
description: Some soldiers report picking up strange radio interference when wearing this armor near alien artifacts.

name: SC-15 Drone Master
description: Some soldiers report picking up strange radio interference when wearing this armor near alien artifacts.

name: FS-38 Eradicator
description: First deployed in the mines of Cyberstan, where it offered protection against explosions in the hydrogen-rich caverns.

description: First deployed in the mines of Cyberstan, where it offered protection against explosions in the hydrogen-rich caverns.

name: EX-03 Prototype 3
description: Because this prototype's wires operate at 400,000 volts, it also includes a handy rubber underlayer for insulation.

description: Because this prototype's wires operate at 400,000 volts, it also includes a handy rubber underlayer for insulation.

name: EX-16 Prototype 16 (Medium Armor)
description: As the electric arc generates a strong magnetic field, wearers should avoid use while in vicinity of stapled paperwork.

description: As the electric arc generates a strong magnetic field, wearers should avoid use while in vicinity of stapled paperwork.

name: FS-34 Exterminator (Medium Armor)
description: Features a patented non-stick coating, which makes scraping viscera off after a long day of battle less taxing.

description: Features a patented non-stick coating, which makes scraping viscera off after a long day of battle less taxing.

name: DP-40 Hero of the Federation (Medium Armor)
description: Though originally intended solely for ceremonial use, its inspirational energy proved equally useful on the battlefield.

name: TR-9 Cavalier of Democracy (Medium Armor)
description: Bearers of this armor ride no equine mount, but are nonetheless borne to battle atop the trusty steed of Liberty.

name: SA-04 Combat Technician (Medium Armor)
description: Due to the enhanced strength caused by this armor, caution is advised when using door handles or embracing colleagues.

name: SA-04 Combat Technician
description: Due to the enhanced strength caused by this armor, caution is advised when using door handles or embracing colleagues.

name: FS-23 Battle Master (Heavy Armor)
description: This aim-stabilizing armor found surprising secondary market success among alien birdwatching enthusiasts.

name: FS-23 Battle Master
description: This aim-stabilizing armor found surprising secondary market success among alien birdwatching enthusiasts.

name: TR-62 Knight (Heavy Armor)
description: Crafted to deliver Justice to the darkest crevices of the galaxy.

name: TR-62 Knight
description: Crafted to deliver Justice to the darkest crevices of the galaxy.

name: CW-36 Winter Warrior (Heavy Armor)
description: Offering camouflage in snowy environments, surplus sets of this armor are used by nature photographers and keen hunters alike.

name: CW-36 Winter Warrior
description: Offering camouflage in snowy environments, surplus sets of this armor are used by nature photographers and keen hunters alike.

name: Light of Eternal Liberty
description: The unimpeachable justice of this cape's design is said to blind the enemies of Freedom with its glorious light.

name: Tyrant Hunter
description: The cape's shredded hem presages the unrelenting savagery its wielder will visit upon the nemeses of Freedom.

name: Bastion of Integrity
description: Based on a SEAF Signaller's Cape, which was intended to enable easy location of fallen heroes by aerial recovery crews.

name: Cloak of Posterity's Gratitude
description: A representation of the thankfulness of those infinite descendants whose liberated existence we strive to ensure.

name: Botslayer
description: A cape that strikes a subroutine emulating fear into the CPUs of all Automatons who conduct visual scans of it.

name: Martyris Rex
description: It is said that only the truly Democratic can lift this cape to their shoulders.

name: Agent of Oblivion
description: 0.05% of profits are donated to Superstone National Park, as part of the Ministry of Unity's "Greener Galaxy" campaign.

name: Beacon of Mercy
description: The clasps on this cape are made from melted down Automaton housingsâ€”evidence of Democracy's inevitable triumph.

name: Wings of Valor
description: Based on the ceremonial pennant flags of early Super Earth, which now adorn the entrance to each Ministry.

name: Eagle's Fury
description: One of the earliest to be mass-produced, this cape has been the final sight of untold numbers of Freedom's foes.

name: Drape of Glory
description: Research suggests that Helldivers wearing this cape are seen as 17% more patriotic.

name: Judgment Day
description: The Helldiver Skull is said to strike fear in the hearts of foes attempting to sneak up on those wearing this cape.

name: Blazing Samaritan
description: Emblazoned with the red, white, and green of the 676th Democracy Regiment, who made their final stand on the slopes of Justice Hill.

name: The Cape of Stars and Suffrage
description: A symbol of Super Earth's Astral Promise: that every star shall one day illuminate throngs of joyous voters.

name: Justice for All
description: Bearers of this cape take upon a sacred duty: that of delivering righteous retribution to every last deserving being.

name: Will of the People
description: Contains a grain of sand from Super Earthâ€”so its bearers carry a small piece of Liberty with them, wherever they go.

name: Mantle of True Citizenship
description: The featherlight construction belies the heavy burden this cape entailsâ€”to live the Creed of the True Citizen.

name: Harbinger of True Equality
description: Wearers of this cape know that even enemies of Freedom deserve to be equal. Equally dead.

name: Freedom's Tapestry
description: Let all who see this cape be struck still with Freedom's beauty, or struck dead with Liberty's bullets.

name: Tideturner
description: Some say that a mere glimpse of this cape, fluttering majestically in the breeze, is enough to spur a squad to victory.

name: Tyranny's Bane
description: Designed by fashion legend RH Gant, the pattern seen on this cape also appears on domestic dresses and gun-warmers.

name: Agent of Oblivion
description: 0.05% of profits are donated to Superstone National Park, as part of the Ministry of Unity's "Greener Galaxy" campaign.

name: Unblemished Allegiance
description: A choir of patriotic schoolchildren sings the Super Earth anthem to each cape as the final step in its production.

name: Light of Eternal Liberty
description: The unimpeachable justice of this cape's design is said to blind the enemies of Freedom with its glorious light.

name: Will of the People
description: Contains a grain of sand from Super Earthâ€”so its bearers carry a small piece of Liberty with them, wherever they go.

name: Cresting Honor
description: The yellow is the exact shade of the Ministry of Unity's 'Golden Gate', leading to the Chamber of Unanimous Decision.

name: Liberty's Herald
description: The two stripes serve as a reminder of the two pillars of successful military campaigns: attack, and further attack.

name: Foesmasher
description: Durable, waterproof, and thermally-lined, surplus units of this cape are favored by domestic campers, to make tents.

name: Independence Bringer
description: This cape's cropped length symbolizes the brevity of galactic conflicts, thanks to the efficiency of the Helldivers.

name: Drape of Glory
description: Research suggests that Helldivers wearing this cape are seen as 17% more patriotic.

name: Wings of Valor
description: Based on the ceremonial pennant flags of early Super Earth, which now adorn the entrance to each Ministry.

name: Beacon of Mercy
description: The clasps on this cape are made from melted down Automaton housingsâ€”evidence of Democracy's inevitable triumph.

name: Unblemished Allegiance
description: A choir of patriotic schoolchildren sings the Super Earth anthem to each cape as the final step in its production.

description: Research suggests that Helldivers wearing this cape are seen as 17% more patriotic.
